EmailTemplate.description: Used to announce incentive for completing training by 7/7
EmailTemplate.name: 10K Way Training Program Reward
EmailTemplate.subject: 10K Way Progress
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello!
Since we launched last week, we’ve had 4 team members earn the 10K Way badge! Congratulations to our early adopters!
I wanted to remind you that we are looking for you to complete the course by July 15 but as an extra incentive, we’re offering a special reward to all who complete the course by July 7! Don't miss out!
Diane
VP, Client Services
